group_1.textLeft: Alright! Today, let's go through the whole routine of finding a Devil and defeating it.

group_1.textRight: So all three of us are gonna beat one of the things @that you two beat before.

group_1.textLeft: Right. You be sure to make an effort too, @okay, Charu?

group_1.textRight: Of course! I've gotten tons of training from Shizuka's mother.
Shizuka has always been in the village, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yep. I was born and raised here my whole life.

group_1.textRight: So are you aaalllways gonna fight as a Diviner here @from now on?

group_1.textLeft: From now on? ...I don't think so.
It's my mission to defeat Devils around the village, @of course.
But a Diviner's true mission has always been to @defeat Devils throughout the entire Land of the @Rising Sun.
So, as long as we're fighting within the village, @we're still immature.
We all have to venture outside some day.
Why do you seem to be worried?

group_1.textRight: 'Cause you hardly know anything about the outside!
I'm sorry. It was just a little bit funny to imagine.

group_1.textLeft: Hrmph... Well, yes, I know little about the world.
However, Sunao, Chiharu. I really am going to leave.
And it'll be soon. There's been fewer and fewer @Devils nearby lately...
I come from the town down below, so I'm not as @closely tied to this place.
The same is true for you, Charu.

group_1.textRight: But we'll have to say goodbye, even though we've @been getting along so well...

group_1.textLeft: Even if we are separated, as long as we fight against Devils in the Land of the Rising Sun,
we will be able to meet again.
Anyway! What's more important right now is @whether you can handle things on your own.

group_1.textRight: Right! Sorry for getting worried about weird stuff.
